product_name: Sahara Sailor Water Bottle, 17oz/25oz/32oz Motivational Sports Water Bottle with Time Marker - Times to Drink - Tritan, BPA Free, Wide Mouth Leakproof, Fast Flow Technology with Clean Brush (1 Bottle)
description: WATER BOTTLE WITH TIME MARKERS: Hydration is a simple trick that helps you stay healthy. This water bottle with motivational quotes and timestamps will always remind you to consume the right amount of water to stay hydrated throughout the day. BPA-FREE: The water bottles are made of food-grade, eco-friendly tritan plastic, which is non-toxic and BPA-free, so you don't have to worry about harmful chemicals. Our water bottles are a good alternative to plastic bottles and can be reused to protect our beautiful planet! HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN: The Sahara Sailor sports water bottle is ergonomically shaped and features a durable wrist strap and a special reflective frosted housing. It is 360Â° leak-proof, robust, durable and shockproof, making it easy to transport. The flip-top lid also features a safety lock that prevents accidental opening. Use the extra cleaning brush to quickly clean your water bottle. EXCELLENT DRINKING EXPERIENCE: A special splash-proof lid can be opened with one hand at the touch of a button. The air holes in the lid ensure a quick and easy flow of water. The soft and durable silicone spout makes it easy to enjoy a leak-proof sip or a quick stream of water without having to lift the bottle. Good for the gym, running, yoga, weight loss, at home and in the office. ENJOY HEALTHY LIVING: To ensure that your Sahara Sailor water bottle stays in good condition, our latest packaging includes a pack of replaceable silicone seals.

latest_reviews.review_title: Such a great and good quality product (which is surprising for the price)
latest_reviews.review_text: Such a great and good quality product (which is surprising for the price)

latest_reviews.review_title: Best Water Bottle on the Market
latest_reviews.review_text: This bottle is perfect! They have thought of every possible inconvenience that comes with water bottles and designed this bottle to avoid even the most minor construction flaw. The top flips open preventing it from falling back as you drink from it. The spout is designed to flow perfectly as you drink from it. The bottle seals and locks in a way that prevents any leakage. And if that wasn't enough, they included extra seals for the future when the seals that come with it eventually wear away. The bottle comes with a strap that makes it very convenient to carry with multiple things as you can wear it on your arm, freeing up your hands. On top of all of that, it conveniently marks how much water you've consumed so you can stay on top of drinking the recommended daily amount of water each day. This bottle is durable and well worth the very inexpensive price.
